title: Count on That
lyrics:
DJ Hoppa
The sun walks on water everytime it rises
You can count on that
What make the money but will never let it divide us
You can count on that

The hood gon have my back

You can count on that

The love gon stay attached

You can count on that

Put that on something

I put that on wrap



Uh yeah

Look up mama I'm pretty far from the palm trees

I knew id make it here back when you used to clean the whole house to John B

And I get goosebumps from head to feet it was all for a scene like a palm read

I wish when people say they promise it was concrete

I miss my cousin call it a choppin like Ron C

Speaking of Ron C shoutout to Texas

GVT still moving the message respect the collective yeah

She on the passenger side rolling up gas for me

Too many snakes hope the creator watch the grass for me

I'm over their shoulder watching them count it accurately

You'll never hear someone say that they wrote my raps for me

You'll never hear em say Price gon snitched or run

Or I bit my tongue got ditched my squad or I ain't get the funds

I walk on water like Christ the melanated type

We really giving yall life tell em to save the hype



The sun walks on water everytime it rises

You can count on that

What make the money but will never let it divide us

You can count on that

The hood gon have my back

You can count on that

The love gon stay attached

You can count on that

Put that on something

I put that on wrap



Yeah look

Now eyes are combined

All the juice from the mind

If i pull up it come back all the time

And i know its no turning back from the sign

So i keep my eyes up and i wise up rise up

Feeling like I was the one never giving none

Still hungry like we never had some

I make a hundred raps and stay up past 1

And back up at it at 5 just happy to be alive

Traveling everywhere getting it done

Second to none

Weapons are drawn everyday in cities for fun

This is for them

They gotta hustle to some

And on that everyday they do it they don't hustle for nothin

Stacking for a rainy day

Because them days do come

You stand there when it rains because they all do run

They all point at your sins but we all do some

Just make sure they never catch you frontin

Cause we know that



The sun walks on water everytime it rises

You can count on that

What make the money but will never let it divide us

You can count on that

The hood gon have my back

You can count on that

The love gon stay attached

You can count on that

Put that on something

I put that on wrap



Nowadays they gonna throw shade on your name

All about a dollar keep the change keep the change

Love front from a taste of the fame

But not me ima stay the same stay the same

My style flexing like that older pile of frame

But I'm switching lanes in a matte black range

Tour life drinking more water for more life

Forward thinking you don't need glasses for foresight

But baby I need my bread like them honey rose

Keep these hoes on they toes like bands with the gummy soles

Cookie cones smooth sailing through these bumpy roads

In life I'm shining solid gold call me 24

Live by the code tomorrow ain't promised to us

Only thing they want running through us is a violent fluid

Let the music move me hit the booth make a movie

Stories written for the people by yours truly



I seen niggas come under me and blow up and I'm still jealous

So this year I'm staying prepared like meal prepping

Real method I feel like a giant that don't exist

That's why I'm only writing classics so they classify shit

We gotta maximize until they advertise this

And I'm like King James get an axe from basketball tips

I got faith in me so that must mean I'm victorious

I'm painting pictures of the media and the law

Probably over your head I resume to me and my dogs

The sun rise

I fall from the sky and break the fall

Condemned sunlight was the birth of my dark skin

All they smelling in that war with they selves like Vietnam

I still don't understand brother man

I know you wasn't dealt an upper hand

But chill you gotta relax

Peace to the land all the people doing what they can

If you need a friend in dizzy wright you know right where im at

Cause



The sun walks on water everytime it rises

You can count on that

What make the money but will never let it divide us

You can count on that

The hood gon have my back

You can count on that

The love gon stay attached

You can count on that

Put that on something

I put that on wrap
